meanings.definition: Consisting of eight parts or elements.
meanings.sent1: The octadic puzzle had eight pieces to solve.
meanings.sent2: The octadic cake was divided into eight equal slices.
meanings.sent3: The octadic team of superheroes each had a unique power.
meanings.sent4: Her octadic personality traits made her a well-rounded individual.
meanings.sent5: The octadic star shape was symmetrical and pleasing to the eye.

meanings.definition: A group or set of eight things.
meanings.sent1: The octadic of colorful balloons floated in the sky.
meanings.sent2: She arranged the flowers in an octadic for the centerpiece.
meanings.sent3: The octadic of puppies played happily in the yard.
meanings.sent4: The octadic of books on the shelf caught her eye.
meanings.sent5: The octadic of planets in the solar system fascinated the students.

meanings.definition: Involving or related to the number eight.
meanings.sent1: The octadic symbol represented the number eight in the ancient script.
meanings.sent2: The octadic sequence continued with the eighth element.
meanings.sent3: His octadic birthday celebration included eight different cakes.
meanings.sent4: The octadic pattern on the fabric was intricate and beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The octadic measurement system was used in the ancient civilization.
